medical_history.chief_complaint: Loss of libido in a 30-year-old married woman with schizophrenia.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient dates the beginning of this symptom to when she first started taking antipsychotics. Her interest in sex had dropped after deciding only to have one child due to financial concerns and her son's disciplinary issues.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 5-year history of antipsychotic medication with medications affecting prolactin levels. History of breast cancer in the family.
medical_history.family_history: History of breast cancer in her family.
medical_history.social_history: Ms. J is married and lives with her unemployed husband and their 5-year-old son. She supports the family with her disability pension and part-time job as a sales clerk.
